metadata.title: 5178-1 -- Django vulnerability
metadata.description: Sjoerd Job Postmus and TengMA discovered that Django incorrectly handled URLs with trailing newlines. A remote attacker could possibly use this issue to bypass certain access controls.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo ua fix USN-5178-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  python3-django - 2:2.2.24-1ubuntu1.1 python-django-doc - 2:2.2.24-1ubuntu1.1 No subscription required
